thread.title: Arbaaz Khan Finally Breaks Silence Over Separation With Malaika Arora Khan!
thread.title_full: Arbaaz Khan Finally Breaks Silence Over Separation With Malaika Arora Khan!

title: Arbaaz Khan Finally Breaks Silence Over Separation With Malaika Arora Khan!
text: Arbaaz Khan Finally Breaks Silence Over Separation With Malaika Arora Khan! More More than films, Arbaaz Khan is in the news for his unfortunate and shocking separation with Malaika Arora Khan. When he was asked about it several times, he avoided the matter but now that he finally has outspoken, here’s what he had to say, “See you have a choice, either you look back at your life and sit back, or you look at it as a lesson and say, ‘Okay, I am going to move on from here’. Any loss that you suffer – be it money-wise, somebody’s demise in the family or a relationship, life goes on. Human beings are meant to survive.” On the career front, Arbaaz Khan will be seen in‘Jeena Isi Ka Naam Hai’ which also stars Himansh Kohli, Manjari Fadnis, Prem Chopra, Ashutosh Rana and Supriya Pathak. The film will hit the screens on March 3 as per reports. Arbaaz also confirmed working on Dabangg 3 starring his elder brother Salman Khan. Arbaaz Khan and Malaika Arora gave us one shocking separation. Having given relationship goals to many and being known for constantly being each other’s support system, the two have taken apart and are living separately. Although, separation has taken place, the two are spotted at mutual functions and events and are seen having a mutual respect for each other.
